mutants.code:
import sqlite3

def create_and_query_table(db_name, table_name, columns, data, condition):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_name)
    c = conn.cursor()
    column_str = ''.join([f'{key} {value}' for (key, value) in columns.items()])
    c.execute(f'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name}\n    ({column_str})')
    c.execute(f'INSERT INTO {table_name} VALUES (?, ?)', data)
    conn.commit()
    c.execute(f'SELECT * FROM {table_name} WHERE age > ?', (condition,))
    result = c.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return result

mutants.code:
import sqlite3

def create_and_query_table(db_name, table_name, columns, data, condition):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_name)
    c = conn.cursor()
    column_str = ', '.join([f'{key}{value}' for (key, value) in columns.items()])
    c.execute(f'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name}\n    ({column_str})')
    c.execute(f'INSERT INTO {table_name} VALUES (?, ?)', data)
    conn.commit()
    c.execute(f'SELECT * FROM {table_name} WHERE age > ?', (condition,))
    result = c.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return result
